sentences.sContent: He was the only man she had ever loved.
sentences.sCn: 他是她唯一爱过的男人。

sentences.sContent: What these kids need is love and support.
sentences.sCn: 这些孩子需要的是关心和支持。

sentences.sContent: ...He knew my love for yoga and had seen a space close to where he lived that he thought might be good to serve as a yoga studio...
...and I promise that you would love it...
...but the thrill of young love seems to have shifted a gear in his mind: from now on...
...I love the colonial fabrics or the silver works...
...I would like to extend my heartfelt thanks to you for your unselfish love shown to me during my preparation of College Entrance Examination...
...care and love and support my study...
...a couple of friends of mine who love biking as much as I do...
...I knew I’d love being my own boss...
...I want to start my own business because I love do what I love...
...They love to share their ideas and materials and help others find markets for their work...

synos.tran: 恋爱；亲爱的；酷爱；喜爱的事物

phrases.pCn: n. 爱情故事，恋爱小说
爱上…（fall in love with的过去式）

trans.tranOther: to have a strong feeling of  affection  for someone, combined with sexual attraction
a strong feeling of caring about someone, especially a member of your family or a close friend
